attributes.action: Article 8 HRA petition against planned Gov opt out.
attributes.additional_details: The UK  should respect and uphold all principles of the HRA and not seek to cherry pick those parts that fit with its own agenda.The Government say that article 8 has allowed criminals and terrorists sanctuary and protection from action,yet the proportion of these cases is minute in comparison to those who have sought to rely on article 8 for lawful and legitimate reasons.The Government should abandon plans to meddle with international law,and instead deal with any shortcomings that  exist within the current frameworks.
